text: Sjarifuddin Baharsjah (16 May 1931 - 14 January 2021) was an Indonesian politician and academic. He was born in West Java, Indonesia. From 1993 to 1998, he was Minister of Agriculture. He was married to Justika Baharsjah. Baharsjah died on 14 January 2021 in Jakarta at the age of 89.Kabar Duka, Mantan Menteri Pertanian Sjarifuddin Baharsjah Meninggal Dunia ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians Category:Indonesian academics
title: Sjarifuddin Baharsjah
